column1: Description: Percentage of income received by each quintile of the population. Data is for 2015 or most recent year prior.
Source: World Bank World Development Indicators, series code SI.DST.FRST.20, SI.DST.02ND.20, SI.DST.03RD.20, SI.DST.04TH.20 and SI.DST.05TH.20.
The following is data downloaded from Development Initiative's Datahub: http://data.devinit.org.
